title: Study finds ChatGPT boosts worker productivity for some writing tasks
summary: A study from MIT researchers reveals that generative AI, specifically the chatbot ChatGPT, can increase productivity in white-collar work. The study involved 453 professionals who were assigned writing tasks related to their occupations. Participants who had access to ChatGPT completed tasks 40% faster and produced higher-quality output. The researchers acknowledge limitations, such as the lack of contextual knowledge and the need for fact-checking. However, they believe the study demonstrates the potential of generative AI in improving productivity, although further research is needed to understand its broader impact on the economy and society.
